meanings.sent1: The two rivers inosculated at the delta, forming a single stream.
meanings.sent2: The chef inosculated the flavors perfectly in the dish.
meanings.sent3: The colors inosculating on the canvas created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship inosculates their hearts like intertwined vines.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces inosculating fit together perfectly, completing the picture.

meanings.sent4: Her words inosculate our thoughts, bringing us closer together.
meanings.sent5: The handshake inosculates their agreement, sealing the deal.
